28,Complete Purchase with Product Selection and Checkout Process,"Navigate to the home page, select a product, add it to the cart, and proceed through the checkout process including shipping and payment, ending with a thank you page.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 4: Click on button AddToCart
Step 5: Click on label productName (iPhone15Pro)
Step 6: Click on label productName (iPhone15ProMax)
Step 7: Click on button Buy
Step 8: Click on link GoToCart -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 9: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
Step 10: Click on link BackToCart -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 11: Click on button quantityAdjustment (Decrease)
Step 12: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
Step 13: Click on div PaymentMethod
Step 14: Fill out shipping address fields and proceed to payment

29,Order Placement with Product Customization and Checkout,Navigate to the home page, select a product variant, add it to the cart, and complete the checkout process including contact and shipping information, ending with a thank you page.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over item object
Step 3: Click on link Apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 4: Click on link iPhone15FineWovenCase -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 5: Click on label iPhone15Plus
Step 6: Click on button Buy
Step 7: Click on link PlaceAnOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 8: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
Step 9: Hover over div CheckoutInfo
Step 10: Click on input Email
Step 11: Enter input value in input Email
Step 12: Click on div ContactInformation
Step 13: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
Step 14: Click on link BackToCart -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 15: Click on button quantityAdjustment (IncreaseQuantity)
Step 16: Click on button quantityAdjustment (IncreaseQuantity)
Step 17: Click on button ProceedToCheckout
Step 18: Fill out shipping address fields and proceed to payment

column2: - Step 4: Enter input value in input FirstName
- Step 7: Enter input value in input LastName
- Step 10: Enter input value in input Address
- Step 13: Enter input value in input ZipCode
- Step 16: Enter input value in input City
- Step 19: Enter input value in input State
- Step 21: Enter input value in input Phone
